meta_description: The Visual Arts Center of Punta Gorda, FL is home to three art galleries, six instructional classrooms, an art supply store, library, and a gift shop. We proudly serve Charlotte, Sarasota, Lee, and Collier County. We are your premier Art Center in SW Florida and beyond.

# VISIT THE GALLERIES

## ART GALLERIES AT THE VISUAL ARTS CENTER (VAC)

### **FOR THE ART VISITOR . . .**

THE VISUAL ARTS CENTER WELCOMES ALL TO EXPLORE AND ENJOY ART THROUGH A SERIES OF EVERCHANAGING ART EXHIBITS AND DISPLAYS . . .

_Exhibits are always free and open to the public._

Stroll through our Galleries, Art Halls and Gift Gallery to explore fine art, pottery, jewelry, glass fiber and a variety of multi-media and specialty artworks from local, regional, national, and international artists. Exhibits change frequently throughout the year. Some exhibits and displays feature only VAC Member Artists and some are open to Artists from around the world. **[_Click Here for the Current Gallery Schedule._](https://visualartcenter.org/pages/gallery-exhibit-schedule)**

### **FOR THE ARTIST . . .**

DISPLAY YOUR ART AT THE VISUAL ART CENTER . . . 

Become a VAC Member and showcase your art through a series of judged, juried, and non-judged exhibit opportunities. Participate in an exhibit, rent a wall to showcase your art, or rent a gallery with other artists to feature an art group, or group of artist friends. Some exhibit opportunities are open to both VAC Members and Guest Artists (hopefully "future members"). **[_Click Here for Call to Artist Information._ ](https://visualartcenter.org/collections/call-to-artists-1)**

# Our Mission is to Inspire, Explore, Create & Promote the Visual Arts

The Visual Arts Center serves Charlotte County, and beyond with three major galleries, 6 classrooms, jewelry, glass, pottery & technology studios, an arts library, Gift Gallery, Art & Supply Store and VAC logo items. Our 12,000 square foot facility provides the best art classes, instructors and exhibit opportunities for the community. Our courses are designed for all ages and skill levels and we offer classes and workshops in a variety of arts media throughout the year.
